Pacific Islands face challenges as growth slows, says World BankGrowth in Pacific Island economies slowed last year to 5.5%, with tourism and remittances from overseas workers recovering in some countries, while shocks from cyclones and drought hampered others, the World Bank said on Wednesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:23:08 GMT XDSD3ACNPRLIDBC6YBH3OPPHYU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pacific-islands-face-challenges-growth-slows-says-world-bank-2024-03-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's Xi Jinping summons 'new productive forces', but old questions lingerFacing its deepest economic challenges in years, China's leadership has tasked ministries and local governments with implementing a new mantra from President Xi Jinping: unleash "new productive forces". Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:03:44 GMT H3HIFQF3M5LIFEGZOTAHD244BI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-xi-summons-new-productive-forces-old-questions-linger-economy-2024-03-05/James Pomfret, Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang世界中国
Brazil's ex-military chiefs told police Bolsonaro discussed coup in 2022, sources sayThe former heads of Brazil's Army and Air Force have confirmed to federal police that ex-President Jair Bolsonaro discussed a draft decree to prevent the handover of power after the 2022 election, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:33:29 GMT LZ4PRFZXKBMZ7FM36H3AXMGVOA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-ex-military-chiefs-told-police-bolsonaro-discussed-coup-2022-sources-say-2024-03-05/Ricardo Brito世界美洲
The 'Volcano group' claiming the arson near Tesla's German plantA far-left militant group calling itself "Vulkangruppe Tesla Abschalten", or "Volcano group shutting down Tesla", has claimed responsibility for the suspected arson attack on a power pylon near Tesla's car factory outside Berlin on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 17:39:56 GMT QJ36OSPXUFLRFK3DUD7SEEQ32U https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/volcano-group-claiming-arson-near-teslas-german-plant-2024-03-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Meta's Facebook, Instagram back up after global outageMeta-owned Facebook and Instagram were back up on Tuesday after a more than two-hour outage that was caused by a technical issue and impacted hundreds of thousands of users globally. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 15:43:35 GMT 7GAZMMQ5AJLLLVLFOHGD4XBAQB4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-facebook-instagram-down-thousands-down detector-shows-2024-03-05/Jaspreet Singh, Aditya Soni技术
Hungary president signs Sweden's NATO membership ratificationHungary's President Tamas Sulyok has signed the bill that approved Sweden's accession to the NATO military alliance, the president's office said on Tuesday, clearing the way for Sweden to become the 32nd member of the alliance in the coming days. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 15:14:43 GMT STGPET7VF5LDPJZRP7XYOXGJNU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-president-signs-sweden-nato-membership-ratification-2024-03-05/Reuters世界欧洲
ICC issues arrest warrants for two top Russian commandersThe International Criminal Court (ICC) has issued arrest warrants for top Russian commanders Sergei Kobylash and Viktor Sokolov for suspected war crimes in Ukraine, it said in a statement on Tuesday. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 13:20:58 GMT 3CSLO2SCYZKE7LKLXR5WQR57QA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/icc-issues-arrest-warrants-against-top- Russian-commanders-kobylash-sokolov-2024-03-05/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
Russia says it is considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon with ChinaRussia and China are considering putting a nuclear power plant on the moon from 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, something he said could one day allow lunar settlements to be built. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:28:07 GMT XYQQ2OEXJKMBDDOC52UTALXFI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/Russia-china-are-considering-putting-nuclear-power-unit-moon-ria-2024-03-05/Reuters技术空间
France's Macron urges allies not be cowardly on UkraineFrench President Emmanuel Macron told expats in Prague on Tuesday it was time for Ukraine's allies to step up, adding that a moment was being approached "in our Europe where it will be appropriate not to be a coward." Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:15:51 GMT WLKN5EDNHROVRC4FUSYFIQ3QQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-macron-urges-allies-not-to-be-coward-ukraine-2024-03-05/Jason Hovet世界欧洲
Haiti PM lands in Puerto Rico as gangs displace thousands at homeHaiti's Prime Minister Ariel Henry landed in Puerto Rico on Tuesday, as questions as to why he had not returned to his country swirled amid escalating gang violence that has threatened to topple his government and left thousands homeless. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 12:02:44 GMT HYIB4WQMUVNJHMD4MLWM4QMVCA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haiti-gang-violence-renders-thousands-homeless-2024-03-05/Steven Aristil, Harold Isaac世界美洲
Republicans back deporting illegal immigrants as Trump looks for Super Tuesday blowoutMany Republicans voting in U.S. presidential primary elections on Super Tuesday said immigration was their top issue and that immigrants in the country illegally should be deported, a campaign pledge made by Donald Trump. Tue, 05 Mar 2024 11:02:49 GMT J3H4YHHDXRJ5TAS6CYX25N7U6E https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-seeks-knockout-super-tuesday-states-choose-nominees-2024-03-05/Alexandra Ulmer, Nathan Layne世界美国
